algorithms.name:
Specialized Fathoming for Small Subproblems
Copyright (C) 2004, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

CbcFathom: Abstract base for specialized fathoming techniques.
After branching, the subproblem may be small enough for specialized
exact methods faster than general B&C.

fathom() return codes:
- 0: No fathoming attempted
- 1: Fully fathomed (optimal for subtree)
- 2: Incomplete search
- 3: Incomplete but treat as complete

Example implementations:
- Presolve to smaller problem, then B&C
- Dynamic programming for special structure

Also contains CbcOsiSolver: OsiClpSolverInterface that knows about
CbcModel (base class for CbcLinked).
